text:
24
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: GEORGETOWN UNIVERSITY
RADIO FORUM
Type: Panel discussion
Time: 30:00
No,: Continuous
Origin: Georgetown University-
Audience : General
Serial Number: £6-£l
Release Date: Date of arrival
The famous Georgetown Forum is now available to Network members. This forum,
winner of many local and national awards, is a continuous series of discussions
of significant topics by authorities.
It will not be possible for us to list the topics and speakers in advance. The
tapes will be flown from Washington, D. C. the day of each original broadcast,
and we will dub and ship them out as soon as possible.
In the event of a very timely program, we will substitute a non-timely discus¬
sion from a group of Forum programs on our shelves. We do not anticipate this
happening very often, however.
